author: Abby
text: Today I made a choice, today I decided to be insubordinate, today I chose not to work in the COVID zone to protect my daughter who is immunocompromisedMy boss said that I can’t refuse to work in that zone, I did different, I said NO GO.

author: Abby
text: Do you remember when you joined Twitter? I do! #MyTwitterAnniversaryi I don’t think anyone really cares lol, this is just another ordinary day like my birthday which always goes unnoticed. https://t.co/9x2feIbIRP

author: Abby
text: So thisSunday April 3rd there is no SWAT because of the Grammy’s. Next Sunday I’m going to start my PVR at 10pm and record SWAT and whatever comes after so that I can actually see a full episode.

author: Abby
text: Jesus lord I’m gonna loose my shit. Again, NCIS ran long and I lost the last 30 minutes. 2 weeks in a row that I don’t get the full episode. What was it this week that caused this. I’m not happy one bit. @CBS

author: Abby
text: The daughters had asked the PAB to put him to bed because he was sleeping in his wheelchair, they said no. WTF, this is his “home” let him sleep. The nurse took vital signs, said he ok and that was that. There is more to consider than VS, you need to assess LOC & pain.

author: Abby
text: Yesterday I had to advocate for a resident at the home I work at. He was not feeling well and does not speak English well. His daughters were there and they were not happy so I told them to call social worker and complain. (Cont’d)

author: Abby
text: Why did NCIS take up 40 minutes of SWAT TIME. I am pissed because I won’t get to see what happens. This is the second time this season that this happened. @SWATWritersRoom @SNOWQUEEN305 @Np18Adriana  can someone send me a link where I could see the whole episode please??

author: Abby
text: Oh man, just watched S5-E13 of SWAT. The ending brought me to happy tears, Hondo telling Nichelle he wants to have a family with her. His mama gonna be happy. Hope this happens. @SWATWritersRoom @shemarmoore

author: Abby
text: I don’t usually ask for prayers 🙏🏻 but today I am. I’m going to get tested for COVID 19 and even though I am double vaxed I have symptoms that are concerning. I’m hoping if I’m +,that my immunocompromised daughter doesn’t get it. (Hope it’s just a bad cold)🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻
